```{r}
library(tidyr)
library (dplyr)
library (ggplot2)
library (lubridate)
```



```{rload file}
setwd("C:\\Users\\Ed\\Documents\\Subclovergit")
getwd()
df_file <- read.table("LoggerTemp.txt",header=TRUE)
head(df_file)

```



```{r airtempmean}
#Calculculate Mean Air temp 



df_file$Date <- dmy(df_file$Date)

df_file <- df_file%>%
group_by(Date)%>%
summarise_each(funs(mean))


#graph meanAir Temp

df_file %>% 
ggplot(aes(x=Date, y= Air)) +
    geom_line()

```


Calculate accumulated TT

```{r}

df_file <- df_file%>%
group_by(Date)%>%
summarise_each(funs(mean))%>%
  mutate(TT = cumsum(Air))%>%
  dplyr::select(-hour,-Air)

write.table(df_file, "ThermalSum.txt")

```


Graph it 



```{r graph}

df_file %>% 
ggplot(aes(x=Date, y= TT)) +
    geom_line()

```
